Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it's worth more than $8000 to you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product at an exclusive price of $12000. I trust this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, aesthetics, and possibly even resale value in the future. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
